_description: Configurable parameters for patient flow simulation. Edit these values to customize the simulation behavior.

triage_weights._comment: Probability distribution for triage categories (T1=Immediate, T2=Delayed, T3=Minimal) by injury type. Values must sum to 1.0

day_distribution._comment: Probability distribution of casualties across battle days. Values must sum to 1.0

body_part_distribution._comment: Probability of injury to each body part. Values must sum to 1.0

facility_defaults._comment: Default rates if not specified in facility configuration

transit_modifiers._comment: Modifiers applied during patient transit between facilities
